description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Action hero Buck Forrest is being forced into retirement!  Help him end his career his way, in a Blaze of Glory.  Blast your way through an endless stream of Thugs and Ninjas with a variety of different weapons and powerups.
description.short: Action hero Buck Forrest is being forced into retirement!  Help him end his career his way, in a Blaze of Glory.  Blast your way through an endless stream of Thugs and Ninjas with a variety of different weapons and powerups.
